akn:section.akn:heading: Road rights-of-way subject to State or local law

akn:content.akn:p: § 521g. Road rights-of-way subject to State or local law Conveyance of any road rights-of-way under sections 521c to 521i of this title shall not be construed as permitting any designation, maintenance, or use of such rights-of-way for road or other purposes except to the extent permitted by State or local law and under conditions imposed by such law. (Pub. L. 97–465, § 5, Jan. 12, 1983, 96 Stat. 2536.)
